stmt.origin: diff.hs0.w(wo(wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- diffsw(hs0, wo(wbr(c1, c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctsr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wo(wbr(c1, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
-| diffsw(hs1, wo(wbr(c1, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c1)))

-| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ TosetRel ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c0]c3 ∨ c3[c0]c1))

comment: A toset is a linear order. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)
